'''Intact Training Dummy''' is a quest item obtained during the [[Daily Commission]], [[The Limitations of an Adventurer]].

==Trivia==
*Besides being the fetch item for The Limitations of an Adventurer, the dummy is later seen in [[Ellin, the Wannabe Knight]].
